snippet.title: The Drifter - Exclusive Official Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description: Learn about the story of The Drifter in this trailer for the upcoming pulp point-and-click adventure thriller game. In The Drifter, dive deep into the web of conspiracies, explore atmospheric environments, and meet many enigmatic characters. The Drifter will be available on PC.
